雿字的基本解释

雿
diào
〔霄雿〕虚无寂寞，如“上游于雿雿之野。”

雿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［diào］
［《字彙》徒弔切］
见“霄雿”。

雿字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【雨字部】　雿； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1373第23
【字彙】徒弔切，音棹。?雿，幽冥也。【王逸·九思】閴?雿兮靡睹。　又【字彙補】直格切，音宅。與翟氏之翟同。高峻貌。【淮南子·原道訓】上遊於霄雿之野。又【俶眞訓】蕭條霄雿，無有彷彿。【又】橫局天地之閒，而不雿不通。　【篇海】本作窕。

雿字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
雿字的起名意思

霄雿，虚无寂寞。

雿
Basic explanation of words
雿
diào
〔Xiaoyu〕 There is nothingness and loneliness, such as "Upstream in the field of Qiong."
雿
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［diào］
["Zihui" is only hanging and cutting]
See "Xiao Qiu".
雿
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Rain Characters】　雿; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1373 Page 23
【Vocabulary】Only hang and cut, Yin Zhao.雿, You Ming also. 【Wang Yi·Jiusi】Hey?　[Word Supplement] Straight grid cut, sound house. Same with Zhai's Zhai. Majestic appearance. 【Huainanzi·Yuan Taoxun】Upstream in the wild of Xiaoqiong. Also 【Fei Xun】 Xiaoxiao Xiaoqiu, nothing seems to be. [Also] The world is free and unreasonable.　【Pianhai】This is a tent.
